metadata.title: KeyQuest - Learn Touch Typing the Fun Way
metadata.description: KeyQuest is a fun, game-driven way to learn touch typing from the ground up. Master typing through engaging lessons and games.

home.headline: Level Up Your Typing Skills
home.subtitle: Embark on an epic journey to master touch-typing through interactive games, personalized lessons, and rewarding challenges. Play, learn, and conquer the keyboard.

trackProgress.title: Track Progress
trackProgress.description: Monitor your typing speed and accuracy over time with detailed performance analytics and achievement badges.

gameModes.title: Game Modes
gameModes.description: Explore a variety of engaging game modes, from arcade-style challenges to story-driven adventures, designed to make learning fun.

certificate.title: Certificate
certificate.description: Earn official certificates upon completing course milestones and share your achievements with friends and potential employers.

whyLearn.title: Why Learn Touch Typing?
whyLearn.description: Touch typing is the ability to type without looking at the keyboard. It's an essential skill for anyone who uses a computer regularly, improving both speed and productivity.

whatIsTouchTyping.question: What is touch typing?
whatIsTouchTyping.answer: Touch typing is a method of typing where you use all ten fingers without looking at the keyboard. Your fingers learn the position of each key through muscle memory, allowing you to type faster and more accurately while focusing on the screen.

howLongToLearn.question: How long does it take to learn touch typing?
howLongToLearn.answer: Most people can learn the basics of touch typing in 2-4 weeks with regular practice of 15-30 minutes per day. Achieving fluency and speed typically takes 1-3 months of consistent practice.

whatIsWpm.question: What is WPM and what is a good typing speed?
whatIsWpm.answer: WPM stands for Words Per Minute, the standard measure of typing speed. Average typing speed is 40 WPM, while professional typists often reach 65-75 WPM. With practice, you can achieve 80-100+ WPM.

whatIsHomeRow.question: What is the home row in typing?
whatIsHomeRow.answer: The home row is the middle row of letter keys on your keyboard (ASDF for your left hand and JKL; for your right hand). Your fingers should rest on these keys and return to them after pressing other keys. The F and J keys have small bumps to help you find them without looking.

isFree.question: Is KeyQuest free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes! KeyQuest is completely free. You can access all lessons, practice modes, and track your progress without any cost or registration required.

touchTyping.definition: A typing technique where you type without looking at the keyboard, using muscle memory to locate keys.

wpm.definition: The standard measurement for typing speed. One word is defined as 5 characters including spaces.

accuracy.definition: The percentage of characters typed correctly. High accuracy (95%+) is as important as speed.

homeRow.definition: The middle row of letters (ASDF JKL;) where your fingers rest between keystrokes.

levels.title: Your Quest Awaits
levels.subtitle: Embark on an epic journey to typing mastery

1.name: Home Row Haven
1.description: Begin your quest with ASDF and JKL;

2.name: Letter Lagoon
2.description: Expand to E, R, T, Y, U, I, G, H

practice.title: Practice
practice.subtitle: Sharpen your typing skills
practice.completedAnnouncement: Practice completed! You typed at {wpm} words per minute with {accuracy}% accuracy.
practice.description: This is where you'll practice your typing skills with real-time feedback.

meta.title: Calm Mode - Stress-Free Typing Practice
meta.description: Practice touch typing at your own pace with no pressure, no timers, and gentle feedback. Perfect for relaxed practice sessions.

calmMode.title: Calm Mode
calmMode.intro: Take a breath. Type at your own pace. No pressure, no timers - just you and the keyboard.
calmMode.pausedHint: Press Space or Enter to resume, Escape to exit

stats.detailedAriaLabel: Typing statistics: {characters} characters, {wpm} words per minute, {accuracy}% accuracy

hints.shortcuts: Enter to start | Esc to pause | Space to resume

games.title: Game Modes
games.subtitle: Practice typing through fun and engaging games

xpInfo.title: Earn XP in Games!
xpInfo.description: Complete games to earn XP and unlock achievements. Daily Challenge gives 1.5x bonus XP!

race.title: Race Game
race.description: Race across the track by typing! Type fast and accurately to keep your car speeding ahead. Errors slow you down!

target.title: Target Shooting
target.description: Hit letter targets before they disappear! Build combos for multiplied points. How high can you score in 60 seconds?

tower.title: Tower Builder
tower.description: Build the tallest tower by typing words! Each correct word adds a block. Errors make blocks fall!

daily.title: Daily Challenge
daily.description: Complete today's unique challenge for bonus XP! Same challenge for everyone. Build your daily streak!

calm.title: Calm Mode
calm.description: Stress-free typing practice at your own pace. No timers, no pressure - just peaceful practice.

achievements.title: Achievements

streak.practiceToday: Practice today to keep your streak
